snippet: The actor Anthony Heald and the downtown performance artist Taylor Mac have been cast in the Classic Stage Company's coming production of "A Midsummer Night's Dream," the theater announced on Wednesday.
abstract: The actor Anthony Heald and the downtown performance artist Taylor Mac have been cast in the Classic Stage Company's coming production of "A Midsummer Night's Dream," the theater announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Taylor Mac Will Be Puck in 'A Midsummer Night's Dream'
